/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. On either side of the street, buildings rise, their facades reflecting the sunlight. The image is taken from the center of the street, creating a symmetrical view that draws the viewer's eye towards the horizon. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of natural and man-made elements, a characteristic feature of Beijing's cityscape.
